price: Yoo nama akka keessaniitiif ajajamtan, dhugumatti isin yoos hoonga’oodha.
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَطَعۡتُم بَشَرٗا مِّثۡلَكُمۡ إِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wala-in aṭaʿtum basharan mith'lakum innakum idhan lakhāsirūna
